p: Fig. 3 shows the severity of the three categories of the QoL domain. At visit 1 most of the patients complained about some discomfort (99.0%) and interference with everyday activities or work (96.5%) or some impact on social activities (93.5%). The number of patients with a moderate to severe degree (together) of symptoms decreased for the three QoL categories distinctly from visit 1 to 4 ( Supplementary Table 2).
